name: wheelie
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
an act of raising the front wheel of a bicycle off the ground and keeping it in the air while riding the bicycle: I can do great wheelies on this bike.
Ulrike Schmitt-Hartmann/DigitalVision/GettyImages
